name: Escaping Their Reality
description:
This game is planned to be a puzzle jumping game, where the player jumps from platform to platform collecting coins and unlocking the next room and secret levels. 

Escaping their Reality is my first game that I've created, it is currently still very early in the project. The aim of this first game is to let me experiment and learn new techniques that I don't already have. It will also help me understand how the entire game development works from a independent stand-point. The images below are early and do not represent the final design and look of the game, these are simply screenshots to showcase and grow an audience for the project.
